ygData.subject: FW: [shadowknight] 9th Level Pet
ygData.msgSnippet: Happened to me to. I was able to use it at Level 10. Sure was frustrating though. Sthiel Cazic-Thule ... From: Robert Porter [mailto:frog42@earthlink.net]
ygData.messageBody:
Happened to me to. I was able to use it at Level 10. Sure was frustrating
though.

Sthiel
Cazic-Thule


-----Original Message-----
From: Robert Porter [mailto:frog42@...]
Sent: Monday, May 03, 1999 4:21 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] 9th Level Pet


From: Robert Porter <frog42@...>

I'm a dark elf shadowknight who's recently reached level 9. I purchased the
Leering corpse spell and memorized it, but then i find i don't have enough
mana to cast it, even when i'm at full. Does this happen to everyone? Do i
have to wait til level 10 to use a 9th level spell?

KaiInnoruuk
